content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The three dots next to the search bar at the top of the content tree is how we perform our advanced search and generate reports: \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":117076,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bbfbdc5a-0392-45e7-bc6a-5b62565511b4/Picture38.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bbfbdc5a-0392-45e7-bc6a-5b62565511b4/Picture38.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture38.png\",\"name\":\"Picture38.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"bbfbdc5a-0392-45e7-bc6a-5b62565511b4\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1028.9931640625,\"height\":467.7241654829545},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":109250,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d95ea331-87b2-4c2a-8416-836a8c9503bf/Picture39.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d95ea331-87b2-4c2a-8416-836a8c9503bf/Picture39.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture39.png\",\"name\":\"Picture39.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d95ea331-87b2-4c2a-8416-836a8c9503bf\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1028.9931640625,\"height\":506.6502289283769},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can search for content in the search area. This search will show all assets that are live within this instance. This shows all pages within the instance, not just the pages within the site. You can add further search modifiers with the plus button to the right. You can then save the search if it is something you are likely to rerun multiple times. You can additionally save results as a report.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once weâ€™ve fixed our search information, we perform the search and then we can save the search and give it a name. We can also save the search as a custom report. To find our report, go to the third option down from the blue menu bar on the left.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":62799,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/73e9dcfa-998d-4ded-bad9-b7cc9981551f/Picture40.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/73e9dcfa-998d-4ded-bad9-b7cc9981551f/Picture40.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture40.png\",\"name\":\"Picture40.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"73e9dcfa-998d-4ded-bad9-b7cc9981551f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":396,\"height\":719.9999999999999},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Log-ins to the training are active for a full month if you would like to be granted access and explore the training instance as well as ask any further questions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
